about_the_game:
FURRY BACKROOMS is a cooperative horror game for 1-8 players, as well as a single-player mode.

The PLAYER попадает into an unknown anomaly and is transferred to creepy and atmospheric rooms - the BACKROOMS. Here you will be met by a terrible and dangerous FURRY who can do something bad to you! I do not recommend meeting him... Or do I?

Gather your friends to go through these terribly tense rooms together and meet the FURRY!

What to expect from the game?

  • Minimalistic interface, realistic graphics and oppressive atmosphere will provide a complete immersion in the world of FURRY BACKROOMS.
  • Cooperative mode will allow you and your friends to fully experience the atmosphere. Try to escape from the FURRY!
  • BACKROOMS are fraught with danger. Various liminal spaces will break your brain.
  • Regular updates - adding new locations and mechanics.

FURRY BACKROOMS is a cooperative horror game for 1-8 players, as well as a single-player mode.

The PLAYER попадает into an unknown anomaly and is transferred to creepy and atmospheric rooms - the BACKROOMS. Here you will be met by a terrible and dangerous FURRY who can do something bad to you! I do not recommend meeting him... Or do I?

Gather your friends to go through these terribly tense rooms together and meet the FURRY!

What to expect from the game?

  • Cooperative mode will allow you and your friends to fully experience the atmosphere. Try to escape from the FURRY!
  • BACKROOMS are fraught with danger. Various liminal spaces will break your brain.

name: FURRY BACKROOMS Demo
short_description: FURRY BACKROOMS is a cooperative game for a group of 1-8 players that combines the best ideas from the BACKROOMS and FURRY universes. Single mode is also available. You have to survive and find a way out before the FURRY catches up with you. Updates and various interesting things await you...
